title: 15 years of STEIN
details: Today marks the 16th anniversary of the band’s first show – April 5, 2004–at JurBiz pub in Brisbane.

title: Faye Festival Cancelled
details: Due to the coronavirus pandemic, STEIN will not be attending or performing at the Faye Festival. Instead we'll be putting on a livestream concert for out wonderful fans and supporters...

title: Listen to Jasons GGC1 Interview
details: I think letter writing is gonna be the next thing that happens again, I hope. I’d like people to communicate in written form. It’s so purposeful. It takes a deliberate effort and therefore it might mean a little more.” ~ Jason Steiner - Listen to Jason's excel...

title: Our music is being featured in this seasons most popular anime
details: It's been a great plasure to work with the Hayaku Animation studio and create something so amazing. As big fans of anime, this has been a dream come true...
